original_title: Warrant, Trixster & Firehouse Live in Lafayette 1991
overview: Warrant, Trixster and Firehouse take to the stage in Lafayette as part of the Blood Sweat & Beers tour.  The performance included an electrifying conclusion as Trixster and Firehouse return at the end of Warrant's set, and all three bands unite to perform a cover of Beastie Boy's hit "Fight For Your Right".  The setlist for the show is as follows:  Firehouse Live In Lafayette 1991  Intro  Overnight Sensation  All She Wrote  Lover's Lane  Rock On The Radio  Shake And Tumble  Love Of A Lifetime  Don't Treat Me Bad  Trixter Live In Lafayette 1991  Intro  Heart Of Steel  Play Rough  One In A Million  Bad Girl  Ride The Whip  Surrender  Line Of Fire  Give It To Me Good  Warrant Live In Lafayette 1991  Intro  Inside Out  Down Boys  32 Pennies  Mr. Rainmaker  Uncle Tom's Cabin  I Saw Red  Love In Stereo  Song And Dance Man  Blind Faith  Heaven  Cherry Pie  Warrant, Trixter & Firehouse Jam: Fight For Your Right
title: Warrant, Trixster & Firehouse Live in Lafayette 1991
